document.title: Hot Topic: Tennessee Department of Agriculture 2006 Urban Forestry Funding
document.abstract: The Tennessee Department of Agriculture Division of Forestry is accepting urban forestry project proposals from local governments, private nonprofit organizations, and educational institutions. Project proposals that address the development of ordinances, staffing, management planning, and advisory organization will be given priority for funding.
